arm.name: arm
arm.transformationDescription:
Within a matter of moments, a layer of [npc.armFullDescription] has quickly grown over them, and, looking down, [npc.she] [npc.verb(see)] heavily scaled skin growing over the backs of [npc.her] hands as sharp talons push out to replace [npc.her] fingernails. [npc.Her] palms are rapidly covered by the same scaly skin that travels up her forearms before blending in with the feathers that cover her [npc.her] upper-biceps where [npc.her] new feathers smoothly transition into the [npc.skin] that's covering the rest of [npc.her] body.
As the transformation comes to an end, [npc.nameIsFull] left with anthropomorphic, [style.boldRaptor(gryphon-like arms and hands)], which are [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.armFullDescription].
arm.bodyDescription: [npc.She] [npc.has] [npc.armRows] arms, which are [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.armFullDescription(true)]. [npc.Her] hands are formed into anthropomorphic, bird-like hands with sharp talons on each digit. Tough, heavily scaled skin covers [npc.her] hands and forearms.
